column3: Create images for an existing property. Send exactly two images in the request
Find all images for a property that has images
Call the same endpoint of test ‘Image01’ swapping the order of the images in the body of the request
column4: 202 - calling the find all images endpoint will return the images with the new order

column3: Call the same endpoint of test ‘Image01’ changing the label of the images in the body of the request
column4: 202 - calling the find all images endpoint will return the images with the new labels

column3: Delete a single image for the property used in the test ‘Image01’. To do that, call the same endpoint but stop sending the image you want to be deleted in the body of the request
column4: 202 - calling the find all images endpoint will not return the deleted image

column3: Delete all the images of a property using the delete all endpoint
column4: 200 - calling the find all images endpoint will return an empty list
